text: Hartford County is located in the north central part of the U.S. state of Connecticut. As of the 2020 census, the population was 899,498. The county has a total area of 1,944 km² (751 mi²). 1,905 km² (735 mi²) of it is land and 39 km² (15 mi²) of it is water. The total area is 2.02% water. == Cities and Towns == *Avon *Berlin *Bloomfield *Blue Hills *Bristol *Broad Brook *Burlington *Canton Valley *Canton *Central Manchester *Collinsville *East Granby *East Hartford *East Windsor *Enfield *Farmington *Glastonbury Center *Glastonbury *Granby *Hartford *Hartland *Hazardville *Kensington *Manchester *Marlborough *New Britain *Newington *North Granby *Plainville *Rocky Hill *Salmon Brook *Sherwood Manor *Simsbury Center *Simsbury *South Windsor *Southington *Southwood Acres *Suffield Depot *Suffield *Tariffville *Terramuggus *Thompsonville *Weatogue *West Hartford *West Simsbury *Wethersfield *Windsor Locks *Windsor == References == Category:1666 establishments in Connecticut
title: Hartford County, Connecticut
